name: Football Up 3D
description:
Football Up 3D is a funny soccer game that allows you total control of any of your team's player's actions: Control the ball, dribble and shoot with effect to confuse the goalkeeper and score a goal!

The ball has inertia and will move freely over the field. Show your ability to control it and make short and long passes. Choose the height, effect and power before shooting at the goal.

Become a football master and make your rival defenders tremble!

Each country has its national team. You can create your own team with the in-game editor: give it the name you like,choose its equipment and, most importantly, play with your Mii™ saved on the Mii Maker™ of your Nintendo 3DS™.

Features:

*Supports "Download Play", allowing two players to share a single copy of Football Up 3D.

* Create your own teams using your Mii.

* Full stereoscopic 3D.

* Total control of height, direction and effect in each pass and shot you make.

* Play the World Cup!
